      void spawnNPC(java.lang.String texture, java.lang.String signature, org.bukkit.Location location, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String id)
      Spawns an NPC for all Players online on the Spigot Server and for all future players

    • Method Detail

      • spawnNPC

        void spawnNPC(java.lang.String texture,
              java.lang.String signature,
              org.bukkit.Location location,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String id)
        Spawns an NPC for all Players online on the Spigot Server and for all future players
        Parameters:
        texture - The value of the Texture. You can get it from the Mojang API
        signature - The Signature of the Texture. You can get it from the Mojang API
        location - The Location where the NPC should be spawned
        name - The Display Name of the NPC
        id - The ID of the NPC it must be unique

      • destroy

        void destroy(java.lang.String id)

        java.util.ArrayList<NPC> getNpcs()
